Introduce getGAApp/getGAService pattern throughout the code.

Add getGAApp() and getGAService() methods to base classes and migrate
the explicit casts to function calls.

For GAFragment the getGAApp() caches the application reference when the
fragment is in a detatched state, thus fixing a crashing bug when
sending funds.
